body:
Since I cannot read Lunnar Runes yet, I'll be waiting for some Demi-god translate this.

All the blessings of the 2d World be with us. And maybe some day, I could make sex with my virtual mother (how mind damage I am!)
Can someone translate this into English.  I will be very grateful.  Thx!
This art feel like Ranma 1/2's xD in the 90s
